name: look at clouds
description:
Relax and watch the clouds roll by… if you spot a shape in the clouds, you can point your flashlight at it to make it stand out.

You can also pixel-edit your clouds, or draw new clouds entirely.

Credits:

Music by Lindar · @lindarthebard

UX critique by Austin · @austinchowe

Everything else by Kelsey · @kelseyhigham

Made for Enbyjam!
